TopicTitle: [Patch 1] Mk2 tag along shows no crew when filled and has no interior [Fixed!]

Articles.Content:
For my drone bomber I added a "taxi" area for ferrying crew around.  Unfortunately this does not show kerbals when filled and it seems to have no interior like the cockpits do.

Edited April 17, 2023 by Jason_25
This looks to be partially fixed with the major bug of not showing kerbals when filled being fixed.  Good job.
